attributes.action: To STOP and LISTEN to the Great British Public on the matters of IDENTIFICATION CARDS and the EUROPEAN UNION and ask if people actually do want to live in an Orwellian Big Brother Society where decision making power has been centralised to an unanswerable European Union.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: PLEASE STOP AND LISTEN TO YOUR PEOPLE.

rejection.details:
There are similar petitions at 
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/ID-Card-vote/
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/Leaving-the-EU/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
